points.title: What is the current status of the project?
points.content: Currently, we are working on finishing up the rest of the artwork as well as the rest of the programming work.

points.title: When Cocks?
points.content: We are aiming for a late-July release if not sooner. We will be posting updates and progress within the server under #announcements.

points.title: How many cocks will be available upon release?
points.content: There will be 6,666 prized cocks available for purchase.

points.title: How much are the cocks?
points.content: Each cock will be sold at 0.06 eth.

points.title: What is the maximum amount of cocks I can mint at a time?
Where can we get a cock?
points.content: Cocks will release on this site, just click the mint button and connect your wallet.
